metadata.Title: CVE-2020-3299 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple Cisco products are affected by a vulnerability in the Snortdetection engine that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker tobypass a configured File Policy for HTTP. The vulnerability is due toincorrect detection of modified HTTP packets used in chunked responses. Anattacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted HTTP packetsthrough an affected device. A successful exploit could allow the attackerto bypass a configured File Policy for HTTP packets and deliver a maliciouspayload.

criterions.comment: snort package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
